titleStmt.title: A letter and declaration of the nobility and gentry of the county of York, to His Excellency the Lord Generall Monck.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at York, and re-printed at London for John Starkey,

notesStmt.note: Desiring the recall of the secluded members and the establishment of a Free Parliament.
The declaration is signed: Tho. Lord Fairfax [and 47 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
